title: Highly Vaccinated South Korea Can’t Slow Down Covid-19
sub_head: More than 80% of the country has received two doses, but officials are now reinstituting restrictions they had vowed to relax
body:
SEOUL—South Korea had successfully contained Covid-19 throughout much of the pandemic, and it now has one of the highest vaccination rates among wealthy countries.
But historic levels of infections, hospitalizations and deaths are prompting the country to reverse plans to reopen and instead take some of the most aggressive measures against the virus of any country in the world.
